Package io.papermc.paper.datacomponent.item

Interface WrittenBookContent.Builder

All Superinterfaces:
DataComponentBuilder<WrittenBookContent>
Enclosing interface:
WrittenBookContent
@Experimental @NonExtendable public static interface WrittenBookContent.Builder extends DataComponentBuilder<WrittenBookContent>
Builder for WrittenBookContent.
